朴刀.definition: sword with a curved blade and a long hilt, wielded with both hands

朴子.definition: Puzi or Putzu City in Chiayi County 嘉義縣|嘉义县[Jia1 yi4 Xian4], west Taiwan

朴子市.definition: Puzi or Putzu City in Chiayi County 嘉義縣|嘉义县[Jia1 yi4 Xian4], west Taiwan

朴智星.definition: Park Ji-sung (1981-), South Korean former footballer, played for Manchester United (2005-2012)

朴槿惠.definition: Park Geun-hye (1952-), Korean politician, daughter of former dictator Park Chung-Hee 朴正熙[Piao2 Zheng4 xi1], president of Korea 2013-2017

朴正熙.definition: Park Chung-Hee (1917-1979), South Korean military man and dictator, president 1963-1979, influential in developing Korean industry, murdered by his bodyguard
